item.description: 发布10分钟的招募--【部分】完全符合的认证会员

sql-item.sql: select a.item_id,a.supplier_id,u.user_id,r.mobile,w.openid,u.`name` from b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_recruit a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item i on a.item_id=i.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity ui on ui.company_id=a.supplier_id INNER join b2b_user.uuc_user u on ui.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id inner join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid WHERE a.is_complete_meet=0 and i.create_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -20 MINUTE) and DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE) and i.register_end_date>now() GROUP BY u.user_id,w.openid
sql-item.description: 发布10分钟的招募--部分符合的认证会员

sql-item.sql: SELECT DISTINCT b.item_id as itemId,d.category_name,CONCAT(d.category_name,'招募公告') as title ,ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name) as company_name, c.developer_type AS developerType,date_format(b.create_time,'%Y-%c-%e') as created_time, date_format(b.register_end_date,'%Y-%c-%e') as register_end_date, GROUP_CONCAT(area_name.item_name SEPARATOR '、') as area_name,concat('https://m.QuartzExt.com/zm/detail-',b.item_id,'.html?registerSource=zm-dx-xzts') as shortURL, if(b.case_num>0,concat('注资',b.register_fund,'万元及以上，案例',b.case_num,'个以上'),concat('注资',b.register_fund,'万元及以上')) as register_condition FROM ( select item_id,categories,company_id,create_time,register_condition,register_end_date,service_areas, ifnull(register_fund,0) as register_fund ,ifnull(case_num,0) as case_num FROM b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item where item_id=@item_id ) b left join ( select item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where supplier_id = @supplier_id and item_id=@item_id ) r on b.item_id=r.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c ON b.company_id = c.developer_id left JOIN ( SELECT company_id,supplier_id FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier a WHERE a.status = 3 AND a.is_del = 0 and supplier_id=@supplier_id ) black on c.developer_id=black.company_id INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest d on b.categories=d.category_code INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_area area on b.item_id=area.item_id inner join ( select item_code,item_name from b2b_parameter.bizp_area union ALL select 'china','全国' ) area_name on (area.province_code=area_name.item_code or area.city_code=area_name.item_code) WHERE r.item_id is null and black.company_id is null and b.register_end_date>now() AND c.company_name not like 'test_%' GROUP BY b.item_id
